inicio.pefce: Electronic platform for the promotion of foreign trade, investment attraction and strategic projects
inicio.desc: The objective of this platform is to promote foreign trade and encourage the attraction of investments to the State of Veracruz by disseminating our strengths as well as promoting strategic projects, including the Tehuantepec Isthmus Development Program, magnifying the scope through the use of information technologies.
inicio.content1: Virtual marketing of products and services
inicio.target_content: The need has arisen to hold virtual fairs, exhibitions and negotiation tables that help to diversify export operations and foster interest in Veracruz businessmen who have not yet exported, to be participants in foreign trade, to which the high costs of participation in international pavilions it is an obstacle.

proyectos_estrategicos.title: Coordination of Strategic Projects and the Isthmus of Tehuantepec
proyectos_estrategicos.subtitle: Isthmus Program
proyectos_estrategicos.content: The Program for the Development of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec (PDIT) seeks to address the economic and social lag in order to restore the well-being of the population of the region, made up of 79 municipalities: 46 belonging to the State of Oaxaca and 33 to the State of Veracruz . Five strategic objectives have been defined for the Isthmus region: 1. Strengthen the social and productive infrastructure 2. Promote a new model of economic growth for development for the benefit of the population 3. Ensure the articulation of emerging actions for the population in situations of extreme poverty 4. Increase biodiversity, and improve the quality of water, soil and air with a sustainable approach 5. Protect, reinforce and disseminate linguistic and cultural diversity, memory and cultural heritage of indigenous and Afro-Mexican peoples, guaranteeing their participation and cultural rights. The Tehuantepec Isthmus Interoceanic Corridor (CIIT) will be the backbone of the PDIT, and will take advantage of the Isthmus's position to compete in the world markets for the movement of goods. With the coordination of the Interoceanic Corridor, the railway of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec, of the ports of Coatzacoalcos in Veracruz and Salina Cruz in Oaxaca will be modernized, the road infrastructure and rural roads will be strengthened, as well as the port network and a gas pipeline will be built to supply companies and domestic consumers. Likewise, polygons will be created along the Isthmus of Tehuantepec that will have incentives to attract investment that triggers the economic and social development of the region, based on the productive vocations with the greatest potential.
